EmailTemplate.name: StarTrack VOC Incident Overdue
EmailTemplate.subject: Unresolved VOC Incident is due
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Case.Nominated_Advocate__c},
This is a courtesy email to advise you that the resolution of VOC Incident {!Case.CaseNumber} is due by COB today. Please ensure you respond to this email attaching the completed VOC resolution form as soon as possible.
Kind Regards, The Voice of Customer Team
{!Case.Thread_Id}
